name: Demo: Product descriptions should not contain technical/code-like text
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Descriptions contain code-like text: ['carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.']
assert not ['carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.']
statusTrace:
page = <Page url='https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html'>

    @allure.title("Demo: Product descriptions should not contain technical/code-like text")
    def test_demo_product_description_consistency(page):
        DemoLoginPage(page).open().login("standard_user", "secret_sauce")
    
        descriptions = page.locator(".inventory_item_desc")
        count = descriptions.count()
    
        bad = []
        code_pattern = re.compile(r"\w+\.\w+|\w+\(.*\)|[\{\}\[\]]")
    
        for i in range(count):
            text = descriptions.nth(i).inner_text().strip()
    
            if code_pattern.search(text):
                bad.append(text)
    
>       assert not bad, f"Descriptions contain code-like text: {bad}"
E       AssertionError: Descriptions contain code-like text: ['carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.']
E       assert not ['carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.']
